body.p: IAS 1 and the Framework state that information about the liquidity and solvency positions of an entity is useful to users. The terms ‘liquidity’ and ‘solvency’ are associated with the availability of cash to an entity. Issuing equity does not result in an outflow of cash or other assets of the entity.
